Overview # A production-grade monitoring solution for Kubernetes clusters using Prometheus (metrics), Grafana (visualization), and Alertmanager‚Äîdeployed via Helm with custom dashboards.
Diagram: Prometheus scrapes metrics from K8s pods/node exporters; Grafana visualizes data.

Overview # A cost-efficient analytics pipeline that fetches YouTube API data (views, engagement) daily via AWS Lambda, processes it with Pandas, and visualizes it in a React frontend.
Flow: YouTube API ‚Üí S3 (raw) ‚Üí Lambda (transform) ‚Üí DynamoDB ‚Üí React frontend
Key Features # üöÄ Serverless: Lambda + DynamoDB + S3 (zero idle costs) üìà Automated Reports: Email summaries via Amazon SES üîÑ CI/CD: Terraform deploys Lambda + API Gateway üé• Filmmaking Metrics: Track audience retention vs. video edits Technical Stack # AWS Services: - Lambda (Python 3.10) - DynamoDB (NoSQL) - EventBridge (scheduled triggers) - S3 (data lake) Libraries: - Pandas (data cleaning) - Matplotlib (generate graphs) - Serverless Framework (deployment)
title: Serverless YouTube Channel Analytics Tool
